title: Plat ADC main LFT

embed.description: Muon / Platinum 5 50LP / 67W 57L Win Ratio 54% / Janna - 8W 4L Win Ratio 67%, Braum - 8W 2L Win Ratio 80%, Morgana - 4W 6L Win Ratio 40%, Shen - 8W 1L Win Ratio 89%, Blitzcrank - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%

body:
Im a ADC main that has peaked at plat 2 but then went through a year of ATAR and have finally finished high school. Im looking to improve as much as possible as i feel i can make those improvements. I am available the entire week at all times. I want to hit challenger by the end of next season, I do think with the right work ethic and help i can achieve it. To improve im looking for a few diamond/plat players to play with in a team or flex queue to get used to better players and learn a lot.
Because i did ATAR i didnt have time for league so decayed down to plat 5. But linked op.gg to show that my MMR is higher than plat 5 supposedly.
Summoner name: Muon
Communication: Discord, skype, teamspeak, curse
Age: 18
Got a good attitude and can be quite a meme at times.
